subject: Self Care
title: Habit Plateaus
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Habit Plateaus.

hook.text: You meditated daily for months and feel no different. The progress is there â€” you just can't see it yet.

buildup.text: The plateau of latent potential describes the gap between effort invested and results visible.

discovery.text: Ice stays solid at 31 degrees. At 32, it melts. One degree makes the difference. Habits work the same way.

twist.text: Most people quit during the plateau. They abandon the habit one degree before the breakthrough.

climax.text: Trust the process. Results are not linear. They compound beneath the surface and then suddenly appear.

punchline.text: Keep going. The breakthrough is closer than it looks.

quiz.question: What is the plateau of latent potential?
options: The gap between effort invested and visible results
A reason to try a new habit
